participant_1.background:
I'm not a big exerciser because I get anxious when I push myself too hard.
i have an iq of 250.
I enjoy playing tennis because it is a good workout and I can play with my friends.
i really like cake and don t prefer vegetables.
I like to listen to music while I work out to help me push myself.

participant_2.background:
My home is wherever I'm sharing my wit.
I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
I've broken many things because of my clumsiness.
I love to watch the deer on my vacation to Lake Michigan.

content.text: It's going well! My favorite part of the day is always the first thing I do when I wake up, which is give my dog a big hug and some breakfast.
That's so sweet! I'm not a morning person so I don't have a specific morning routine, but I do like to play tennis in the afternoons.
I would love to learn how to play tennis! I'm not very athletic but I think it would be a lot of fun.
It's not as hard as you think! And it's a great workout.
Maybe I'll take a lesson sometime! I'm always looking for new ways to get exercise.
I know what you mean. I don't like to work out unless I'm doing something I enjoy, like tennis or playing basketball.
Exactly! And it's more fun to do things with other people, so I'm always looking for new friends to play sports with.
Me too! I'm always down to meet new people and make new friends.
I think we should play tennis sometime!
That would be fun! I'll bring my racket and we can go to the park.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
